title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
The Software Engineer aspect of the position is responsible for designing and implementing powerful, highly scalable, and reliable products and services.

Software Engineer responsibilities may include:

  • Design, develop, and implement software packages.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues with web-based applications, websites, and mobile applications.
  • Translate functional specifications into logical, component-based technical designs.
  • Proactively identify and build effective solutions to solve complex technical problems.
  • Collaborate with team members to understand product vision and requirements; execute against plan to deliver high quality software on schedule.

The Software Quality Assurance (QA) aspect of the position is responsible for effectively contributing to our test framework and services.

Software Quality Assurance responsibilities may include:

  • Actively participate in group technology reviews to critique the work of self and others.
  • Have an understanding and knowledge of performance and application testing.
  • Anticipate and prevent problems and roadblocks, before they occur, and present technical issues and their impact.

Desired skills:

  • A general knowledge of standard software engineering concepts, practices, and procedures
  • Construct, call and architect Rest Services and Web APIâ€™s
  • Java, C# or C++ and object-oriented concepts
  • Various software development technologies and frameworks such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JSON, XML, Svelte, graphql, node.js and python
  • A general understanding of databases

During this internship, Daycos will give the intern position hands-on business experience in their field of study. This may include working on actual real-time business tasks in their position, attending standup meetings with the team they will be working on, as well as project meetings for a specific project or service their team is working on. The intern will be paired with a mentor to work alongside with throughout the duration of their internship.

Learn more about Daycos:

  • www.daycos.com/internship
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_iiyJVzET1c
